resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
Added continue as new workflow support for use by ELB.

Related eutester pull request:
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eutester/pull/400

Fix Approved.
Test added and passing in eutester4j and subsequently N4j. 

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.3.0
Release     : 0.24955.305.20160606git455d10d.el6
